title: SET_WIND_DIRECTION
content:
0xEB0F4468467B45280x381AEEE9// SetWindDirection
void SET_WIND_DIRECTION(float direction);Parameters:direction: the wind direction in radiansSets the wind direction. The wind direction will stay persistent until it is reset (see examples).Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- 180 degrees, wind will blow from the south
SetWindDirection(math.rad(180.0))

-- Allows the game to dynamically change the wind direction again
SetWindDirection(-1)
codeBlocks:
-- 180 degrees, wind will blow from the south
SetWindDirection(math.rad(180.0))

-- Allows the game to dynamically change the wind direction again
SetWindDirection(-1)
